metro.GameScreen.MainView.PlayingField

Class CityView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
        • metro.GameScreen.MainView.PlayingField.CityView

  • public class CityView
extends GameScreen
    GameScreen with the city view. It Shows the population density and basic player information. This class is used by the TrainView-class as "background image".
    Author:
    Hauke
